name: Secret of Escape
description:
Secret of Escape is a fast-paced stealth game, you control a man named Thomas, trapped out in the middle of nowhere inside a complex building run by a mysterious and psychopathic host known only as Dyer. With a series of explosives strapped to his body and a camera following his every move, Thomas has to play Dyer's game in order to survive. If he can make it through all of Dyer's levels, and find the keys to in the levels, Thomas will leave free.

The game has numerous levels with one main goal, you start from a green zone and you have 15 seconds to reach the red zone where the timer stops.

If the timer reaches zero, the explosives on Thomas' body will detonate, killing him instantly. However all the levels are filled with death traps…Mines. Spikes, Vision Based Turrets, Sound Seeking Androids and more. Just don't forget, do not let time run out.
